title: Movie Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Aaah! That was really good~! Kasumin is so glad it had a happy ending~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah, you’re right.... Uuu, *sniff*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Are you still crying, Riko-senpai? Ah, your handkerchief is soaked.... Here, use mine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>O-, okay. I’ll take it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Come on, let’s sit down over there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Thank you, Kasumi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Haaah~, anyway, that main character was really cute, huh? They had your hairstyle, Riko-senpai. Maybe Kasumin should grow out my hair too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I think your current hairstyle is cute and really suits you, Kasumi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehe~, doesn’t it!? The current Kasumin is the best Kasumin ever, so~. Ah, they’re selling ice cream! Riko-senpai, your throat must be parched after crying so much, right? Let’s get some ice cream!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. Then, I’ll treat you some as thanks for the handkerchief.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yaaay! Kasumin wants the strawberry one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
